name: No Pineapple Please!
description:
"No Pineapple Please!!!" is a game made for LÖVE Jam 2018

Pineapple has no place on pizza in space!
Take my KARATE HAND and protect the pizza from invading pineapple. Time slows down when you are not moving, use this master tech to plan your strategy. Deflect pineapple into other pineapple to perform CHAIN and earn more zorkmid!

Disclaimer: The views expressed in this computer entertainment product are for funsies only and do not necessarily reflect the views of the author. I love ham and pineapple pizza :P

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow keys move player
Space to allow time to pass at normal rate.
Space to confirm menu selection.

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

Left Analog Stick or D-Pad to move player
A button to allow time to pass at normal rate
A or START to confirm menu selection

OTHER CONTROLS

Press m key to mute/unmute the music. 

CREDITS

All art, code, sound, and music were created by Edwin DeNicholas except for the following items:
* LÖVE game engine
* FONT: https://www.dafont.com/titania.font
